Open the Chrome application from the home screen.
Open the Chrome app, displaying the search bar and frequently visited websites.
Click the back button to close the keyboard and return to the main browser screen.
Type "weather forecast" into the search bar or type web address field.
Press enter on the keyboard to load the website.
Acknowledge the user's request by stating "I have searched for weather forecast."
Click the home icon to return to the browser's start page.
